## format() function

Formats string using '%s', to print '%s' you have to use '%%s'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function format(str: string, ...args: any[]): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | String containing substitution constants |
|  args | any\[\] | Arguments that are used for replacement |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
